an4.65:1.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.65:1.3: There are those whose estimation of and confidence in others is based on appearance, on eloquence, on mortification, and on principle.
an4.65:1.4: These are the four people found in the world.
an4.65:2.2: and those swayed by a voice,
an4.65:2.3: are full of desire and greed;
an4.65:3.3: the fool shut in on every side,
an4.65:3.4: gets carried away by a voice.
an4.65:4.4: they’re also carried away by a voice.
an4.65:5.4: they don’t get carried away by a voice.”
